word:
Chap. 13 - Ministry of the Printed Page

               Work of First Importance 

     If there is one work more important than another, it is that of getting our publications before the public, thus leading them to search the Scriptures. Missionary work-- introducing our publications into families, conversing, and praying with and for them--is a good work.--The Colporteur Evangelist, p. 80.
